mapper.select:
select a.storeId,a.storeNo,a.addTime,b.accountName,s.`name`,a.process,a.remark,bc.cardNumber from t_store a LEFT join sys_user b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor s on s.supervisorId=a.supervisorId left join t_bankCard bc on bc.userId=a.userId where 1=1 and bc.bankType=0
AND ( b.accountName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.accountName}),'%') )
AND a.supervisorId = #{relationMap.supervisor}
AND a.process = #{relationMap.repaymentStatus}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY a.addTime DESC
select supervisorId,name from sys_supervisor where status=0
select bankType,accountType,userName,cardNumber,idType,idCard,remark from t_bankCard where userId=(select userId from t_store where storeId = #{storeId}) and bankType=0

select a.repayId repayId,a.repayNo,a.addTime,c.orderNumber,b.storeName,a.planRepayDate, a.planTotal/100 planTotal,a.status, ifnull(a.repayMoney/100,0) repayMoney, ifnull((a.planTotal/100-ifnull(a.repayMoney/100,0)),0) withholdMoney from t_repay a LEFT join t_store b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT join t_order c on a.orderId=c.orderId where 1=1 and a.status!=-1
AND b.storeId=#{relationMap.storeId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.planRepayDate,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.planRepayDate,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND (a.status = 0 or a.status = 3)
AND a.status = #{relationMap.status}
AND ( a.repayNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') or c.orderNumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') or b.storeName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
ORDER BY a.addTime desc

SELECT a.repayId repayId, a.repayNo, a.addTime, c.orderNumber, b.storeName, a.planRepayDate, a. STATUS, cast((a.planTotal/100) as DECIMAL(13,1)) planTotal, cast((ifnull(a.repayMoney / 100, 0)) as DECIMAL(13,1)) repayMoney, cast((ifnull((a.planTotal / 100 - ifnull(a.repayMoney / 100, 0)),0)) as DECIMAL(13,1)) withholdMoney from t_repay a LEFT join t_store b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT join t_order c on a.orderId=c.orderId where 1=1 and a.status!=-1
AND b.storeId=#{storeId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.planRepayDate,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.planRepayDate,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND (a.status = 0 or a.status = 3)
AND a.status = #{status}
AND ( a.repayNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fuzzyCondition}),'%') or c.orderNumber LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fuzzyCondition}),'%') or b.storeName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
ORDER BY a.addTime desc
select o.orderNumber from t_order o inner join t_repay r on o.orderId=r.orderId where r.repayId=#{0}
SELECT repayDetailId,repayId,repayMoney/100 repayMoney,repayTime,repayType,operator,remark FROM t_repay_detail WHERE repayId=#{0} ORDER BY repayTime DESC

select t.storeId storeId,t.storeName storeName,s.`name` name,IFNULL(SUM(o.orderPrice),0) orderPrice,count(o.orderId) orderNum from t_store t left join sys_supervisor s on s.supervisorNum=t.supervisorId left join t_order o on o.userId=t.userId and o.orderStatus !=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
GROUP BY t.storeId,t.storeName,s.`name` having 1=1
AND t.storeName LIKE CONCAT(#{relationMap.storeName},'%') or s.name LIKE CONCAT(#{relationMap.storeName},'%')

select t.storeName storeName,s.`name` name,cast((IFNULL(SUM(o.orderPrice), 0)/100) as decimal(13,1)) orderPrice, count(o.orderId) orderNum from t_store t left join sys_supervisor s on s.supervisorNum=t.supervisorId left join t_order o on o.userId=t.userId and o.orderStatus !=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.orderTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
GROUP BY t.storeId,t.storeName,s.`name` having 1=1
AND t.storeName LIKE CONCAT(#{storeName},'%') or s.name LIKE CONCAT(#{storeName},'%')
SELECT ts.*,ss.* FROM t_store ts LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor ss ON ts.supervisorId = ss.supervisorId;
